link.Abstract: It's that time of year again: our parents are cheering while we're wiping away the mascara-stained tears from our faces and heading back to school. To make things a little easier this year, we're helping you pass Beauty 101 by recapping this year’s best-reviewed beauty products from our Buy or Beware column. Your course schedule might be a mess, but your face won’t be.
link.title: Top 10 Back-to-School Must Have Beauty Items

entry.title: Beauty Buy or Beware: Razors

link.Abstract: Now that the weather has finally warmed up, our ultimate beauty goal is super silky-smooth legs. Luckily for us, razors have become more advanced than ever. Whether they’re tricked out with bikini trimmers or gel strips that promise to eliminate the need for shaving cream, these aren’t your mother’s razors. Find out which razors lived up to their claims and which one will be tossed in the trash.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Now that the weather has finally warmed up, our ultimate beauty goal is super silky-smooth legs. Luckily for us, razors have become more advanced than ever. Whether they’re tricked out with bikini trimmers or gel strips that promise to eliminate the need for shaving cream, these aren’t your mother’s razors. Find out which razors lived up to their claims and which one will be tossed in the trash.
link.title: Beauty Buy or Beware: Razors
